sections.title: 1. General Information
content: The website www.justbettersites.com is operated by JustBetterSites, a provider of personalized digital services.
We do not have a physical headquarters. By using this website, you agree to our privacy policy.

sections.title: 2. Your Rights
content: (i) Right to be informed: the right to know the identity of the data controller, the purpose of data processing, the recipients or categories of recipients, and the existence of the rights provided by Law no. 677/2001 and the conditions under which they may be exercised.
(ii) Right of access to data: the right to obtain from the controller, upon request and free of charge once a year, confirmation as to whether or not data relating to you are being processed.

(iii) Right to intervene: the right to request, free of charge, the rectification, updating, blocking, deletion or transformation into anonymous data of data that is not processed in accordance with the law, especially incomplete or inaccurate data.

Additionally, according to the provisions of Regulation (EU) 679/2016, known as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the website www.justbettersites.com is committed to strictly respecting the confidentiality of personal data and clearly and transparently presenting how we collect and use the data provided through the contact form, as described in the following sections.

sections.title: 3. GDPR Compliance
content: JustBetterSites complies with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR) and Law 677/2001.
We are committed to protecting your personal data with transparency and responsibility.

sections.title: 4. Data Collection
content: We collect personal data through contact forms or communications initiated by you.
This includes full name, email address, phone number, and information about your digital needs.

sections.title: 5. Use of Data
content: To respond to your inquiries.
To create personalized offers.
To improve our website and services.
To contact you via email or phone.

sections.title: 6. E-Commerce and Confidentiality
content: We are the sole owners of the collected data.
Your data will not be sold, transferred, or shared without your consent.
If you do not agree with our offer, your data will be deleted immediately.

sections.title: 7. Disclosure to Third Parties
content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website or conducting our business, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

We believe it is necessary to exchange information in order to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, potential threats to physical safety, violations of our terms of use, or as otherwise required by law.

sections.title: 8. Data Protection
content: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Only employees who need to perform specific tasks (e.g., billing or responding to inquiries) have access to personally identifiable information.
The computers/servers used to store personally identifiable information are kept in a secure environment.

sections.title: 9. Cookies
content: Yes. Cookies enhance access to our site and identify repeat visits. Additionally, our cookies improve the user experience by tracking and targeting user interests.
This use of cookies is not linked to any personally identifiable information on our site.

sections.title: 10. Consent
content: By submitting inquiries via the contact forms on this website or any other communication platform using our contact information, for which we can validate the affiliation, you agree to our privacy policy by checking the specific box under the contact form.
